ygData.subject: Re: possible big cheat for EQ....
ygData.msgSnippet: no one really hacked UO... heh they just made third party script programs.... but with the ALT-TAB problem.. thats almost impossible to do with EQ.... lets see
ygData.messageBody:
no one really hacked UO... heh
they just made third party script programs....
but with the ALT-TAB problem.. thats almost impossible to do with EQ....
lets see what comes of it will we? =D

-----Original Message-----
From: kale usi <kaleusi@...>
To: EQCheats@onelist.com <EQCheats@onelist.com>

Subject: Re: [EQCheats] possible big cheat for EQ....


>From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>

>>From: "Justin Howard" <mhoward1@...>

>>

>That's what they said about UO. Look what happened there. Give it time,

>inevitable, because if it can be programmed, then someone can
counterprogram
>it. It's just a matter of time. And if you think patches will help, just
>look at Diablo. It didn't stop them there. Personally, I hope nothing comes
>of it.
>
>Just my 2 coppers worth.
